mapper.select: SELECT A.*,M.* from ( SELECT a.apply_id,a.resume_id,a.media_id,a.apply_result,a.apply_date,a.id,a.hire_id, r.resume_title,rd.resume_profile, rd.resume_name,rd.resume_gender FROM apply_information a,resume r,resume_detail rd WHERE a.resume_id =r.resume_id AND r.resume_id=rd.resume_id and a.hire_id =#{hire_id}) A LEFT OUTER JOIN user_media_intro M ON A.media_id = M.media_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM message WHERE message_receiver= #{id} AND message_check ='N'
select R1.* from (select * from user_portfolio_file where id=#{id} order by file_id asc )R1 limit 8 offset 0
mapper.insert: insert into user_portfolio_file ( id, file_original_name, file_saved_name ) values ( #{id}, #{file_original_name}, #{file_saved_name} )
insert into user_media_intro ( id, media_original, media_saved, media_update ) values ( #{id}, #{media_original}, #{media_saved}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.* from(select m.message_id, m.message_title, m.id, m.message_receiver, m.message_check, m.message_content, m.message_date, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.autho, u.joinDate from message m,users u WHERE m.id =u.id AND m.message_receiver = #{id} order BY m.message_date desc ) A limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into message ( id, message_receiver, message_check, message_content, message_date, message_title ) values ( #{id}, #{message_receiver}, 'N', #{message_content}, NOW(), #{message_title} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM apply_information a, hire h , resume r WHERE a.hire_id =h.hire_id AND a.resume_id=r.resume_id AND a.id= #{id}

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT a.hire_id,a.apply_id,a.id,a.resume_id,a.apply_result,a.apply_date, h.hire_open,h.hire_condition,h.hire_educate,h.hire_state,h.hire_title,hi.hire_apply_time, r.resume_title,r.resume_state FROM apply_information a, hire h , resume r,hire_apply hi WHERE a.hire_id =h.hire_id AND a.resume_id=r.resume_id AND h.hire_id=hi.hire_id AND a.id= #{id} order by a.apply_date desc ) A limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
